response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value and relevance to your needs, just like it does for me. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I kindly propose a purchase price of $14,500 for this product. I trust this offer reflects the true worth while allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
